Name: PeoplePackages
About the game: If you throw a bag filled with water, it will explode like a small bomb. You will be amazed, throwing them at objects and see how these bags are gone. In this game, the packages explode by touching various objects, like pedestrians, birds, cops. When you hit a policeman you'll get a penalty, it leads to game over. If you hit pedestrians and birds you raise your score, you can spend it to improve. Join this exciting and addictive game and get more bonuses!
